verses.roman:
namas tubhyaṁ bhagavate
puruṣāya mahīyase
sarva-bhūta-nivāsāya
vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe

synonyms: namaḥ tubhyam—I offer my respectful obeisances unto You; bhagavate—unto the Supreme Personality of Godhead; puruṣāya—the Supreme Person; mahīyase—the best of all personalities; sarva-bhūta-nivāsāya—the person who lives in everyone's heart; vāsudevāya—the Lord who lives everywhere; sākṣiṇe—the witness of everything.
translation: O Supreme Personality of Godhead, greatest of all, who lives in everyone's heart and in whom everyone lives, O witness of everything, O Vāsudeva, supreme and all-pervading person, I offer my respectful obeisances unto You.
